title: Underground Cities
description: People have built homes and cities below the Earth’s surface for centuries. Underground Cities describes some of these interesting and unusual places. From bunkers and ancient cities to modern shopping centers and business complexes, underground dwellings can be found all around the world. In addition to teaching students about a fascinating topic, use this book to teach main idea and details and subject–verb agreement.
meta: archaeologists, circulation, complex, dwellings, engineering, excavated, humidity, mine, pillars, preserved, residents, subterranean
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Subject-Verb Agreement : Understand and use subject-verb agreement
